name: The Abyss (itch)
description:
Curiosity sometimes good for taking yourself one step further, but sometimes it takes your self from you. 

This is exactly what happens to our guy. He saw a shiny, interesting and maybe tasty cube. He decide to look at it closer. When he get closer, the villian comes from his abyss and took miner's body, but does he already has his soul? Well... He will lose it even there it is, because The Villian wants his revenge. 

She learned too many spells and got very professional on them at the abyss which humans send him to that place. Now she will be the death of them. 

(We won't work on this game anymore )
